Texts.Eng: The Vat'iish have a tradition that any of their faction can become the leader so long as they can defeat the current one in a trial by combat. A challenger mustfirst prove their might in a test decided by the 10 Vat'iish council members, and should they survive, the leader will allow the trial totake place.

The race as a whole is run by a large council of 20 members, and 2 leaders, 10 Kir'vat, and 10 Vat'iish. The leader of the Kir'vat stays on the homeworld, and changes every 4 years through a democratic election. The leader of the Vat'iish, however, changes often.
